bill.title: Dept. of Education; require to conduct annual legislative and board update information sessions in each school district.
bill.description: An Act To Require The State Department Of Education To Conduct Meetings In Each School District At Least Once A Year To Provide The Local Public With Update Of New Laws, Regulations And Policies Impacting The Field Of Education; To Authorize The Department To Conduct Any Or All Such Meetings Via Electronic Media Transmitted To A Public Forum In The School District; To Require The State Superintendent Of Public Education To Appoint A Committee Of Department Employees Responsible For Being Well Informed Of Legislative Changes And Board Policy That Will Facilitate These Public Informational Sessions Throughout The State; To Require The Department To Conduct Such Meetings From The Date Of Sine Die Of The Mississippi Legislature Through December 31 Of Each Year, With The First Of Such Meetings To Be Held Not Later Than July 1; To Require The Department To Coordinate Its Meeting Schedule With Each School District; To Bring Forward Section 37-3-5, Mississippi Code Of 1972, For Purposes Of Possible Amendment; And For Related Purposes.
